attributes.action: people with asthma should get free prescriptions
attributes.additional_details: At the moment people who suffer with asthma have to pay for there prescriptions (if they dont get  excemption) And it can work out pretty excpencive if you have to have  2 inhalers and steriod tablets. I want  to get  the Goverment to  reconise  this can be life threatning . so i need support  please help me
